docs.snippet: Iman Shumpert's return from a knee injury Thursday gave the Knicks a booster shot of youth and defense....
docs.abstract: Iman Shumpert's return from a knee injury Thursday gave the Knicks a booster shot of youth and defense.

headline.main: Shumpert's Return Boosts Knicks' Defense, Depth

docs.snippet: N.B.A. Commissioner David Stern said at a news conference in London on Thursday that he was not aware of any rules violated by the Knicks’ recent use of courtside microphones....
docs.lead_paragraph: N.B.A. Commissioner David Stern said at a news conference in London on Thursday that he was not aware of any rules violated by the Knicks’ recent use of courtside microphones.

headline.seo: N.B.A. Commissioner Advocates for More Microphones at Games
headline.main: What Issue? Stern Wants More Audio Taping at N.B.A. Games
headline.print_headline: What Issue? Stern Wants More Audio Taping at N.B.A. Games

docs.snippet: Kobe Bryant will make his 15th straight All-Star start. The Knicks’ Carmelo Anthony will join the Heat’s LeBron James and Dwyane Wade in the Eastern Conference lineup for the Feb. 17 All-Star Game in Houston....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant will make his 15th straight All-Star start. The Knicks’ Carmelo Anthony will join the Heat’s LeBron James and Dwyane Wade in the Eastern Conference lineup for the Feb. 17 All-Star Game in Houston.
docs.abstract: NBA All-Star starting lineups announced; Los Angeles Lakers guard Kobe Bryant will make his 15th consecutive All-Star start.

docs.snippet: The Knicks, feeding off Carmelo Anthony, jumped on the Pistons early, by as many as 20 points in the first half, then held off a third-quarter rally....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Knicks, feeding off Carmelo Anthony, jumped on the Pistons early, by as many as 20 points in the first half, then held off a third-quarter rally.
docs.abstract: New York Knicks defeat Detroit Pistons, 102-87, in front of a sellout crowd in London; Knicks forward Carmelo Anthony scores an exciting 26 points.

headline.seo: Carmelo Anthony Leads Knicks Over Pistons in London
headline.main: With Crowd on Their Side, Anthony and the Knicks Romp in London
headline.print_headline: With Crowd on Their Side, Anthony and the Knicks Romp in London

docs.snippet: A nine-month inquiry determined that Billy Hunter failed in his fiduciary responsibilities and that the board of the union should consider replacing him....
docs.lead_paragraph: A nine-month inquiry determined that Billy Hunter failed in his fiduciary responsibilities and that the board of the union should consider replacing him.
docs.abstract: Nine-month inquiry determines that Billy Hunter failed in his fiduciary responsibilities as executive director of the National Basketball Players Assn and that the union’s executive board should consider replacing him; inquiry, which focused on allegations of nepotism, conflicts of interest and potential misuse of funds, concludes that Hunter did not embezzle or steal from the union.

headline.seo: Report Questions Actions of N.B.A. Union Chief Billy Hunter
headline.main: Inquiry Questions Actions of N.B.A. Union Chief, but Finds No Criminality
headline.print_headline: Inquiry Questions Actions of N.B.A. Union Chief, but Finds No Criminality

docs.snippet: Tim Hardaway Jr. scored 21 points to help No. 5 Michigan stave off No. 9 Minnesota, 83-75....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tim Hardaway Jr. scored 21 points to help No. 5 Michigan stave off No. 9 Minnesota, 83-75.
docs.abstract: Michigan beats Minnesota, 83-75, in men's college basketball.

headline.main: No. 5 Michigan Prevails With Hardaway’s Help
